title: Showery conditions expected to enhance in several provinces
byline: Showery condition is expected to enhance in Eastern, Northern and Uva provinces during the coming days, due to the development of a low-level atmospheric disturbance to the East of Sri Lanka, the Department of Meteorology said.

title: One killed, 02 injured in shooting incident in Kaduwela
byline: One person has been killed and two others had reportedly sustained injuries in a shooting incident reported in the Koratota area in Kaduwela, police said.

title: Italy says US has sharply cut proposed pasta duties after a review
byline: The United States sharply lowered proposed new duties on several Italian pasta makers following a preliminary review of their alleged anti-dumping activities, the Italian foreign ministry said on Thursday.
